    • Constructor Detail

      • Board

        public Board(java.util.ArrayList<Player> playerList)
        This is the constructor for the Board class. Whenever a Board is created, it takes players as input and creates the tile, pieces and cards.
        Parameters:
        playerList - players that are in the game
        See Also:
        Player

    • Method Detail

      • initializeTiles

        public static void initializeTiles()
        This method initialize the tiles and puts them to the tile list. It uses the tile factory to create the tiles and take the necessary information from the JSON file containing the information of the tiles.
        See Also:
        TileFactory, Tile

      • initializePieces

        public static void initializePieces(java.util.ArrayList<Player> playerList)
        This method initializes the pieces according to player list given Also it associates the pieces to the players
        Parameters:
        playerList - the list of the players that will play
        See Also:
        Player, Piece

      • initializeCards

        public static void initializeCards()
        This method initialize cards by using the Card Factory Adds the created cards to the respective cards list.
        See Also:
        Cards
